title: We Will Never Get Back Together: A Second Chance Romance - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Josei   Mature   Romance   Tragedy

description: 'A five-year marriage: she is alone during the registration of the marriage and so was she during the pregnancy in October. She got such serious throes of pre-production that she passed out several times. After she woke up, still alone. The first words Zhan Xunjue said to her were:' She's come back, we shall divorce now.'>
